detaileddescription.para: Fref = Fin / N; Fvco = Fref * M Fout = Fvco / NO
N = input divider value (1, 2, 3 … 15) M = feedback divider value (4, 5, 6 … 16383) NO = output divider value (1, 2, 4, or 8)
1 Mhz <= Fref <= 50 Mhz 200 Mhz <= Fvco <= 400 Mhz

briefdescription.para: enable the clk of ahb device
disable the clk of ahb device
configure the sdio clk divisor sdio is in ahb bus
configure the spi master's clk divisor
configure the debounce clk divisor of gpio8b
configure the debounce clk divisor of gpio4b
